name: install-claude-parallel
description: CLI installer for Claude Parallel - parallel AI implementations with GitHub Actions

scripts.build:scripts: bun build src/agents/planning-agent.ts --outfile templates/scripts/planning-agent.js --target node && bun build src/agents/linear-agent.ts --outfile templates/scripts/linear-agent.js --target node && bun build scripts/claude-agent-runner.ts --outfile templates/scripts/claude-agent-runner.js --target node
scripts.build:all: npm run build:cli && npm run build:scripts
